## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-13.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-13.5, 23.5) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 21.0) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) - Status: WORKING

### Pipe Network

- Pipe Group at position (-10.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-10.5, 22.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Pipe Group at position (-9.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY

### Electricity Group at Position (-3.67, 20.21)
- Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly aligned and within range to connect. Verify the positions of the pipe-to-ground entities to avoid connection failures.

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Check for existing objects in the target location before placing pipes. Ensure the target tile is clear of any obstructions to avoid placement failures.
- Avoid placing pipe-to-ground entities on water tiles as their footprint cannot overlap water. Choose a different location that is suitable for placement.

### Errors due to Lack of Inventory
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place them. Keep track of your inventory levels to avoid running out of essential items like pipes.
